title: Krysten Ritter goes braless in black frock with sheer bodice and tulle skirt at El Camino premiere
text:
She gave birth to her first child two months ago.

And on Monday night, Krysten Ritter, 37, looked sensational at the Los Angeles premiere for El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie.

The actress, who starred in the original AMC series, went braless in a black frock that had a sheer bodice with beaded embellishments.

Wow factor: She gave birth to her first child two months ago. And on Monday night, Krysten Ritter, 37, looked sensational at the Los Angeles premiere for El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie

The Jessica Jones star flashed an eye-full of cleavage in her chosen outfit.

The dress had cap sleeves and a below-the-knee black tulle skirt.

Krysten added a pair of black and gold heels and carried a small black purse.

She accessorized with diamond drop earrings and her long raven hair was loose and styled with a center parting.

Cleavage baring: The actress, who starred in the original AMC series, went braless in a black frock that had a sheer bodice with beaded embellishments

Looking fabulous: The dress had cap sleeves and a below-the-knee black tulle skirt, and the actress added a pair of black and gold heels

Stylish star: Krysten accessorized with diamond drop earrings and a small black purse. Her long raven hair was loose and styled with a center parting

New parents: Krysten, 37, gave birth to her first child - a son named Bruce - in late July with musician boyfriend Adam Granduciel, 40, who accompanied her to the premiere

The actress was accompanied to the red carpet event by her boyfriend Adam Granduciel, 40.

The couple, who started dating in 2014, welcomed their son Bruce in late July.

Meanwhile, Krysten's Netflix series Jessica Jones came to an end after three seasons this year.

The show was one of the best reviewed of Netflix's Marvel shows, which also included Daredevil, Luke Cage, Iron Fist and The Punisher, but they were all canceled in short succession.
description: The Jessica Jones star, 37, welcomed her son Bruce in late July with musician boyfriend Adam Granduciel.
